cz.ive
Class IveExecutor

java.lang.Object
  cz.ive.IveExecutor

public class IveExecutor
extends java.lang.Object

Main of the whole application. It performs the command line parameters parsing and fires the application. Command line parameters: --system-look Use default system look and feel. --aqua-look Use aqua look and feel. --noDAG Do not use the DAG in the TriggerKeeper. --stop-on-empty Stop the simulation when the calendar gets empty. -d --debug Additional debug strings in the Gui. -w [XML filename] Loads World from the specified XML file. -i [filename] Loads previously saved Simulation from a file. -l --log Log to the standard output. -m [count] Size of the circular log (1000 by default). -h --help View the help page (this page). --log-cpu Log the cpu load to the log.

Author:
ondra
